import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-headings', templateUrl: './headings.component.html', styleUrls: ['./headings.component.scss'] }) export class HeadingsComponent { }

Headings

All HTML headings, <h1> through <h6>, are available.

Code Font-Size Heading
<h1></h1>

1.875rem

Heading 1 (MEGA)
<h2></h2>

1.625rem

Heading 2 (XL)
<h3></h3>

1.375rem

Heading 3 (LARGE)
<h4></h4>

1.25rem

Heading 4 (MEDIUM)
<h5></h5>
1rem
Heading 5 (SMALL)
<h6></h6>
0.875rem
Heading 6
